name: Space Roll
description:
HOW TO PLAY

In Space Roll you control a space-dice with the goal of surviving and obtaining the highest score.

The dice is equiped with 3 powerful weapons that fire automatically:

1. Laser: shoots a laser that passes through enemies.

2. Blob Launcher: shoots 2 blobs that deal massive damage.

3. Triple Gun: rapid fire machine gun that shoots in three directions

The dice can also roll to obtain invincibility for a brief time and change to a random weapon.

On the top of the screen there's a dice that shows your score multiplier.

- If you kill 10 enemies in a row the multiplier will increase one point

- If you get hit the multiplier will be set back to one

- If you get hit while the multiplier is one you loose

CONTROLS

- Player Movement: W,A,S,D / Up, Down, Left, Right

- Roll: SpaceBar
